attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would like an explanation for the disgusting, disgraceful and disrespectful behaviour shown by the Majority of over 400 peers reported to have begun to walk out during Government Minister Baroness Northover's tribute to some of our brave fallen.
We find their actions utterly disrespectful and an insult to the memories of all Our Brave Fallen. We call for an immediate reprimand to all who left and to see a public apology made via Media Coverage........
